titles.title: 300 On Christ Salvation Rests Secure (familiar tun

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
On Christ salvation rests secure
The Rock of Ages must endure
Nor can that faith be overthrown
Which rests upon the "Living Stone"

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
No other hope
Shall intervene
To Him we look
On Him we lean
Other foundations we disown
And build on Christ
The "Living Stone"

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In Him it is ordained to raise
A temple to
Jehovah's praise
Composed of all
His saints who own
No Savior but
The "Living Stone"

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
View the vast building see it rise
The work how great
The plan how wide
O wondrous fabric pow'r unknown
That rests it on
The "Living Stone

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
But most adore
His precious name
His glory and
His Grace proclaim
For us the lost
condemned undone
He gave Himself
The "Living Stone"
